images.description: A few of the many different screens of the DDRS app.
This screen lets the user review all of the different data they recorded for a given meal.
This photo shows the complete device in the process of recording a video of a meal. It is important for the device to rotate around the meal, so that video captures multiple perspectives of the food.
This photo shows the complete device in the process of recording a video of a meal. It is important for the device to rotate around the meal, so that video captures multiple perspectives of the food.
This is the screen that prompts the user to record a video of their food.
This is the home screen of the DDRS app.
Levi also created a second app that was used for internal testing of the video-based volume-calculation algorithm.
